column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////It's very surprising in city the size of Houston
column2: Common Bond is a rarity in great breads AND pastries.  There are very few bakeries in Houston that can boast as many different baked goods and do it well.  Perhaps this is why the bakery is packed to the gills on the weekends and consistently sells out on the more popular items.  Don't let the crowds deter you
column3: turnover on tables is quick and the food is worth the wait!
